name: HashFunction
desc: A type that performs cryptographically secure hashing.

items.name: associatedtype Digest
items.desc: The type of the digest returned by the hash function.

items.name: protocol Digest
items.desc: A type that represents the output of a hash.

items.name: static func hash<D>(data: D) -> Self.Digest
items.desc: Computes the digest of the bytes in the given data instance and returns the computed digest.

items.name: func update<D>(data: D)
items.desc: Incrementally updates the hash function with the given data.

items.name: func update(bufferPointer: UnsafeRawBufferPointer)
items.desc: Incrementally updates the hash function with the contents of the buffer.

items.name: func finalize() -> Self.Digest
items.desc: Finalizes the hash function and returns the computed digest.

items.name: static var blockByteCount: Int
items.desc: The number of bytes that represents the hash functionâ€™s internal state.
